body: Whoa, so she reverse raped the guy in the end to reawaken her primal instincts to be ready to pleasure her husband. This is a pretty good resolution to the NTR tbh.
Why is it in hentai that these guys go to the trouble of marrying "former" sluts, and then work away from home for long periods, leaving the wife unsatisfied and easy prey to slutty guys? *Facepalm*
Man i love this artist shame i cant get more of his work.
